attributes.action: remove the monarchy and make england a republic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the queen has no real purpose other than tourism, and is a waste of public resources. how are we really a democracy when we have an unelected leader who we throw money at to have the most comfortable lifestyle possible. it needs to change.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/republic/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
